description:
Do you want a HIGH-QUALITY JAVA COURSE that explains every code line-by-line with using zoom-in/zoom-out, sketch motions, animations and subtitles with premium support(reply in 24 hours)?

Join the class and start learning today to earn much more in the future!

(If you think that this course does not worth any cents you give, you can get your money back in 30 days!)

____________________________________________________________

LATEST UPDATES:

>> Special document : lecture 273 "300+ Java Interview Questions & Answers v1.7" is published as a downloadable document!!

April 6th 2016 : Section 16, Quiz : "Understanding Object-Oriented Programming(OOP)" is published,

April 6th 2016 : Section 17, Lecture 136 : "Why Getter And Setter Methods Better Than Using 'public' Fields?" and its closed captions(subtitles) are published!

April 6th 2016 : Section 17, Lecture 137 : "Using 'protected' keyword" and its closed captions(subtitles) are published!

April 6th 2016 : Section 17, Lecture 138 : "Exercise" and its closed captions(subtitles) are published!

April 6th 2016 : Section 17, Quiz : "Understanding Encapsulation" is published,

April 6th 2016 : Section 17 Source Codes is also published!!


>> Don't forget that all of our students have access to AKINCI Training's Premium Support, meaning you can get clear responses to your comments, suggestions or questions within 24 hours!

____________________________________________________________

What makes Step By Step Java Programming Complete Course different?

  • Every line of code is described step-by-step in each video.
  • The subject is told in a clear and simple way.
  • Step By Step Java Programming Complete Course has 1280 x 720 HD quality videos with zoom-in/zoom-out, sketch motions, animations and subtitles!!
  • We worked with 28-year-experienced voice over professional to dub our videos in his professional recording studio (It's very important for us to be understandable for you)
  • When you buy this Java course, you will get all of the source codes that's developed in training videos!!!
  • Although the videos start from scratch and contain every detail needed, each video is 5 minutes long in average.
  • This course is different, because it is important for us to be available every time you need support in your learning experience with our course. You can e-mail us for any questions or comments on the course subject, we will reply you quickly.
  • We use Eclipse IDE while coding,
  • You can use the videos not only for learning, but also as a reference guide at any time you need.
  • Step By Step Java Programming Complete Course is prepared for you to solve frequently encountered problems without losing any time.


What you will be able to do after completing this course?

  • You'll be able to write your own Java programs
  • You'll get verifiable completion certificate
  • You'll have really good programming background. When you need to learn something new, your background is very important to learn it easily and quickly. This course is one of the best way to get a strong background quickly.
  • When you complete this course, you'll know everything you need to continue our course set that contains advanced courses about design patterns, J2EE(Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition), JFC (Java Foundation Classes),.. etc


What are the requirements?

NOTHING TO KNOW!!

Since we designed this course for everyone who want to learn Java programming language, we started from the point of “What is language?" and “What is programming language?" and continued to final sections for advanced topics like:

  • Java generics and annotations,
  • Dynamic binding,
  • Overriding extended parent class methods using inheritance,
  • Calling a constructor from an another constructor,
  • Removing duplicates in ArrayList.

and so on.

You don't need to buy any other videos, documents or any other thing. It's enough for you to have a computer to write your own codes. You can find everything else in this course :)

We designed this course for you to learn Java programming language.

If you want to take this course, you don't need to know anything about programming, you don't need to have any experience on programming. This course starts from the point of explaining "what is language?", and "what is programming language?". We tried to explain every topic starting from a complete beginner's level.

____________________________________________________________

Step By Step Java Programming Complete Course contains:

  • Totally about more than 190 HD training videos,
  • More than 50 downloadable documents
  • More than 20 quizzes
  • More than 20 “Do it yourself exercises"
  • Special discount coupons for our future courses
  • Full source code archieve
  • High-quality training support

What is the target audience?

Everyone who wants to learn the Java programming language

____________________________________________________________

What you will learn in our course?

SECTION 1 : Introduction to the Course

SECTION 2 : Introduction To Java (With Brief Slides)

SECTION 3 : Downloads & Settings

SECTION 4 : Using Eclipse IDE – Part 1

SECTION 5 : Writing Your First Java Program : "I'm in Java world!!"

SECTION 6 : Using Eclipse IDE – Part 2

SECTION 7 : BONUS SECTION : Using Java Message Dialogs : JOptionPane

SECTION 8 : Data Types & Variables

SECTION 9 : Arithmetic Operations With Math Class

SECTION 10 : Operators

SECTION 11 : Methods

SECTION 12 : Control Statements - Part 1 : Decision-Making Statements

SECTION 13 : Control Statements - Part 2 : Looping Statements

SECTION 14 : Arrays

SECTION 15 : ArrayLists

SECTION 16 : Strings

SECTION 17 : Classes

SECTION 18 : Object Oriented Programming(OOP)

SECTION 19 : Object Oriented Programming – Encapsulation

SECTION 20 : Object Oriented Programming – Polymorphism

SECTION 21 : Object Oriented Programming – Inheritance

SECTION 22 : Working On Date And Time

SECTION 23 : Random & Secure Random Numbers

SECTION 24 : Using Comments In Java

SECTION 25 : Java Annotations

SECTION 26 : Java Generics

SECTION 27 : DOCUMENTS

SECTION 28 : SPECIAL GIFT

____________________________________________________________

If you need help about our courses please contact with our premium support via email.

We wish our lectures will be helpful to you and your career.

Good luck, and have fun coding!! :)
title: Step By Step Java Programming Complete Course
